DisplayName: Bank of Zambia - Monetary Policy Division
Mandate: Maintain price stability, manage foreign reserves, and oversee the payment system while supporting financial sector integrity.
TopPriorities: Ensure liquidity in the banking system during mining revenue volatility.
Coordinate with ZRA to detect currency outflows that hide VAT rebates.
Spread cybersecurity best practices to banks and financial institutions.
ActiveOperations: RTGS monitoring cell flagging foreign exchange trades tied to flagged mining exporters.
Open banking data-sharing initiative with commercial banks for AML screening.
Financial stability reports citing revenue leaks uncovered by partners.

RecentActions.Title: Financial stability review - Monetary Policy Division
RecentActions.Summary: Published analysis of banking sector performance and systemic risk factors.

RecentActions.Title: Joint cyber response enhancement
RecentActions.Summary: Upgraded monitoring systems to track suspicious payment settlement activities.

DisplayName: Bank of Zambia - Regional Office - Mongu
Mandate: Maintain price stability, manage foreign reserves, and oversee the payment system while supporting financial sector integrity.
TopPriorities: Ensure liquidity in the banking system during mining revenue volatility.
Coordinate with ZRA to detect currency outflows that hide VAT rebates.
Spread cybersecurity best practices to banks and financial institutions.
ActiveOperations: RTGS monitoring cell flagging foreign exchange trades tied to flagged mining exporters.
Open banking data-sharing initiative with commercial banks for AML screening.
Financial stability reports citing revenue leaks uncovered by partners.
